  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    junit.framework.Assert
    Please use Assert instead.
    org.junit.internal.runners.ClassRoadie
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    cascading.operation.aggregator.ExtremaBase
    cascading.flow.hadoop.HadoopFlowConnector
    org.junit.internal.runners.JUnit4ClassRunner
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    cascading.operation.aggregator.Max
    org.junit.internal.runners.MethodRoadie
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    org.junit.internal.runners.MethodValidator
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    cascading.operation.aggregator.Min
    cascading.tap.hadoop.TemplateTap
    see PartitionTap
    org.junit.internal.runners.TestClass
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    org.junit.internal.runners.TestMethod
    Included for backwards compatibility with JUnit 4.4. Will be removed in the next major release. Please use BlockJUnit4ClassRunner in place of JUnit4ClassRunner.
    org.junit.rules.TestWatchman
    Use TestWatcher (which implements TestRule) instead.
    org.junit.internal.matchers.TypeSafeMatcher
    Please use TypeSafeMatcher.

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    cascading.tuple.hadoop.TupleSerialization.addSerialization(Map<Object, Object>, String)
    cascading.tuple.hadoop.TupleSerialization.addSerializationToken(Map<Object, Object>, int, String)

    cascading.tuple.Tuples.asArray(Tuple, Class[])
    cascading.tuple.Tuples.asArray(Tuple, Class[], Object[])
    org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(double, double)
    Use assertEquals(double expected, double actual, double delta) instead
    org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Object[], Object[])
    use assertArrayEquals
    org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(String, double, double)
    Use assertEquals(String message, double expected, double actual, double delta) instead
    org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(String, Object[], Object[])
    use assertArrayEquals
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.both(Matcher<? super T>)
    Please use CoreMatchers.both(Matcher) instead.
    cascading.util.Util.captureDebugTrace(Class)
    see TraceUtil.captureDebugTrace(Object)
    cascading.tuple.Tuples.coerce(Object, Class)
    cascading.tuple.Tuples.coerce(Tuple, Class[])
    cascading.tuple.Tuples.coerce(Tuple, Class[], Tuple)
    cascading.tuple.Tuples.coerce(Tuple, int, Class)
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.containsString(String)
    Please use CoreMatchers.containsString(String) instead.
    cascading.tap.hadoop.io.StreamedFileSystem.delete(Path)
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.either(Matcher<? super T>)
    Please use CoreMatchers.either(Matcher) instead.
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.everyItem(Matcher<T>)
    Please use CoreMatchers.everyItem(Matcher) instead.
    org.junit.internal.RealSystem.exit(int)
    org.junit.internal.JUnitSystem.exit(int)
    org.junit.experimental.max.MaxCore.forFolder(String)
    use storedLocally()
    cascading.util.Util.formatTrace(Operation, String)
    see TraceUtil.formatTrace(cascading.operation.Operation, String)
    cascading.util.Util.formatTrace(Scheme, String)
    see TraceUtil.formatTrace(cascading.scheme.Scheme, String)

    cascading.tuple.hadoop.TupleSerialization.getSerializationTokens(Map<Object, Object>)
    cascading.tap.hadoop.Hfs.getTemporaryDirectory(Map<Object, Object>)
    see HfsProps
    org.junit.rules.ExpectedException.handleAssertionErrors()
    AssertionErrors are handled by default since JUnit 4.12. Just like in JUnit <= 4.10.
    org.junit.rules.ExpectedException.handleAssumptionViolatedExceptions()
    AssumptionViolatedExceptions are handled by default since JUnit 4.12. Just like in JUnit <= 4.10.
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.hasItem(Matcher<? super T>)
    Please use CoreMatchers.hasItem(Matcher) instead.
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.hasItem(T)
    Please use CoreMatchers.hasItem(Object) instead.
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.hasItems(Matcher<? super T>...)
    Please use CoreMatchers.hasItems(Matcher...) instead.
    org.junit.matchers.JUnitMatchers.hasItems(T...)
    Please use CoreMatchers.hasItems(Object...) instead.
    cascading.util.Util.makeTempPath(String)
    cascading.tuple.Tuple.parse(String) 
    org.junit.runners.model.FrameworkMethod.producesType(Type)
    This is used only by the Theories runner, and does not use all the generic type info that it ought to. It will be replaced with a forthcoming ParameterSignature#canAcceptResultOf(FrameworkMethod) once Theories moves to junit-contrib.
    cascading.tuple.TupleEntry.set(Comparable, Object)
